column5: I'm going to be in Dwight this weekend and would like to do a little fishing. Anybody have any info on oxtongue lake?

Had a cottage there for 15yrs, there still is a few Lakers around, it's a pretty busy little lake now. Try the deeper waters 85-100' depths, I know of a few spots along the North east shoreline where the water drops off that had Lakers. I believe there is a " one rod per angler restriction " on Oxtonge for winter fishing.Some of the nearby back lakes had good populations of speckies, not sure if they stock them now.
